## LightModel.setAlbedoMap() method

Sets the albedo texture

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAlbedoMap(tex: Texture2D, sampler: TextureSampler, texCoordIndex: number, texTransform?: Matrix4x4): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [Texture2D](doc/markdown/./device.texture2d.md) | The texture to set |
|  sampler | [TextureSampler](doc/markdown/./device.texturesampler.md) | Sampler of the texture |
|  texCoordIndex | number | Texture coordinate index of the texture |
|  texTransform | [Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md) | _(Optional)_ Transformation matrix for texture coordinates of the texture |

**Returns:**

void
